bibl.title: Antinoopolis October / November 2012. Work in the Church at the Eastern Gate and at the Supposed Praetorium.
bibl.note: 1. Activities around the church beside the eastern gate: 1. Further examination of the so-called chiostro; - 2. Work in the crypt of the church beside the eastern gate. - 2. A test trench at the supposed praetorium. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Peter Grossmann, Antinoopolis October / November 2012. Work in the Church at the Eastern Gate and at the Supposed Praetorium.
Raccolta di scritti dedicati a Orsolina Montevecchi. IV = Aegyptus 91 (2011 [2014]) pp. 111-125, 6 pll.; - 329-330.

1. Activities around the church beside the eastern gate: 1. Further examination of the so-called chiostro; - 2. Work in the crypt of the church beside the eastern gate. - 2. A test trench at the supposed praetorium. - Avec résumé en anglais.
